ctx: intros p a t m H1 H2.
tactic: apply reconnaissance_ind with (d := non_coacc_kill p m).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable d (possible names are: P, p, a and t).

original: intros p a t m H1 H2. apply reconnaissance_ind with (d := non_coacc_kill p m). - intros d a0 t ladj H3 H4. apply rec_dta with (ladj := ladj). + apply H3. + apply H4. - auto.
